title: Object Detection using MobileNet-SSD
features: Engineered a real‑time object detection pipeline using MobileNet‑SSD v3 and OpenCV, enabling 30+ FPS inference on standard CPUs.
Implemented modular Python scripts for image and video detection, integrating TensorFlow inference graphs and COCO label mapping for 80‑class recognition.
Optimized deployment by packaging dependencies and delivering user‑friendly CLI tools, reducing setup time by 70% for non‑technical stakeholders.
